summary.para: The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.Validation.Win.v13.1.dll assembly.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Validation.Win.ValidationWindowsFormsModule.GetModuleUpdaters(DevExpress.ExpressApp.IObjectSpace,System.Version)

summary.para: Returns the list of updaters that handle database updates for the ValidationWindowsFormsModule module.

member.param: An object which represents the Object Space used to update the database.

member.returns: An IEnumerable@lt;@gt; list of updaters that handle database updates for the ValidationWindowsFormsModule module.
